basis: The user shows persistent willingness to implement and has articulated a concrete plan with adjustable reminders, but there is no direct evidence of consistent follow-through within this week-long window. Their commitment is moderate and practical rather than guaranteed.
coaching_notes: Preserve flexibility (offset option and wake-based shifts) and quick toggles (longer log ON/OFF). Emphasize micro-commitments and automated reminders, especially for travel or social days. Consider adding brief check-ins after urges to reinforce logging and consolidate behavior change.
